trans-unit.source: Specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining a control's size and position.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os limites do controle a serem usados ao definir o tamanho e a posição do controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: Use os membros dessa enumeração ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> classe.

trans-unit.source: Both <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size" /> property values are defined.
trans-unit.target: Ambos valores de propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size" /> são definidos.

trans-unit.source: The height of the control is defined.
trans-unit.target: A altura do controle é definida.

trans-unit.source: Both <see langword="X" /> and <see langword="Y" /> coordinates of the control are defined.
trans-unit.target: Ambas as coordenadas <see langword="X" /> e <see langword="Y" /> do controle são definidas.

trans-unit.source: Both <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property values of the control are defined.
trans-unit.target: Ambos valores de propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> do controle são definidos.

trans-unit.source: The width of the control is defined.
trans-unit.target: A largura do controle é definida.

trans-unit.source: The left edge of the control is defined.
trans-unit.target: A borda esquerda do controle é definida.

trans-unit.source: The top edge of the control is defined.
trans-unit.target: A borda superior do controle é definida.
